body:
Hi Rob,


Thanks for sharing all these wonderful resources. This is good to start up
with this but somewhere i read that Radiance will be fully functional on
openstudio GUI by the end of sept with the release of V0.9. meanwhile i
will explore it more and look forward to use it on GUI. I will ask my
doubts if come across anything miscellaneous while learning.


Thank you once again!


On Tue, Aug 21, 2012 at 8:32 PM, Guglielmetti, Robert <
___
